discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Ha tobbiyaan asi ba qofaa wottiyoode neeyyo erissoy gelees. Ne doorotun erissota giigissotun giigissana danddayaasa.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|haasayaa sinttata]] hageeti asay oyqettaa medhiyoogaa tobbiyoode hagan {{SITENAME}} gidikko keehi lo'iyaaba. [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]] ha sinttaa haraatuuraa waati lo'issiyaakko tobbiyaa doomiyoode Go'ettanawu danddayaasa.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Asay hagan {{SITENAME}} neeyyoo qoncce kiitaa wottanawunne eti hegaa ottiyoode ne eranawu [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|haasayaa sinttaa]] go'ettoosana.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Asay hagan {{SITENAME}} ne go'ettaydda de'iyoo IPee beettiyoosan ne harumatabaa neeyyoo qoncce kiitaa wottanawu [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|talk page]] go'ettoosana.

Daro IPee beettiyoosay wodiyan wodiyan laamettoosona, hegaadankka darotoo cora asaassi shaakettoosona. Neeni gelennan go'ettiyaagetu  shabbirssaa xayssanaassi [$1 create an account] woykko [$2 log in]. Akkawunttiyaa dooyiyoogee IPee neettiyoosaakka genttees.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user:
[[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|Haasayaa sinttata]] hageeti asay danddayettikko keehin lo'o gidiyaa {{SITENAME}} oyqettaa waati medhiyaakko tobbiyoosaa. Gattanawunne kushettanawu ooratta tobbiyaa doomma. {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|aara}}
[[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|Hasayaa sinttaa]] hageeti asay oyqettaa waati medhiyaakko tobbiyoosaa {{SITENAME}} keehin lo'iyaagaa. Ha IPee beettiyoosan ne giigida harumatabaa tobbiyaa doommanawu ha sinttaa go'etta. Hagan ne giyoobay asa ubbay be'anawu qoncce. Daro IPee beettiyoosay wodiyan wodiyan laamettoosona hegaadankka darotoo cora asaassi shaakettoosona.
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self: Ne haasayaa sinttaakko hashshu saro yaasa
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-an: Ha haasayaa sinttaakko hashshu saro yaasa
discussiontools-emptystate-title-user-an: Ha haasayaa sinttaakko hashshu saro yaasa
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: Ne qofay gelibeenna, gaasoy hara asi nenadan ba qofaa issi mala saatiyaan wottis. Hayyanaa zaarada mala, woykko oratta qofata be'anawu sinttaa zarada eha.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Ne sinttan zaaraydda de'iyoo qqofaa demmanawu danddayettibeenna. I xayiichennan aggenna woykko hara sinttaakko yuuyyis.
Hayyanaa sinttaa zarada eha yaatada zaara mala.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" ha gattiyaagee ha qofaassi zaaruwaa immannawu go'ana danddayenna. Zaaranaassi "$1" haga caddada hayyanaa kumetta sinttaa harumissiyaagaa go'etta.
"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" ha gattiyaagee ha qofaassi zaaruwaa immannawu go'ana danddayenna, gaasoykka i hara sinttaappe yiis. Zaaranaassi hayyanaa hagaakko ba:[[$1]].
discussiontools-error-comment-not-saved: Ne qofay Keehi keehi mata wode birshshettaassi attamettana dandayibeenna. Mata wode laamettidabata be'anawu, ne doometta qofaa duuqqanne bessiyaagaa go'ettada sinttaa zaara eha.
discussiontools-error-lint: Wiikiixuufiyaan balay de'iyo gaasuwan ha sinttan de'iya qofata zaarana danddayettenna. Ha balatubaa ha [$1 issippe uttida fayileta nabbabiyoogan], luxanaassi, maaduwaassi oychiyoogan, [$2 hagan gatti oyttiyoogan] woykko hagan [$3 kumetta sinttaa harumissiyaagaa dooyiyoogan] balaa pagalana danddayaasa.
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove: Atotetta oychayis, beettiyaa hanotaakko zaariyoogee danddayettenna gaasoykka hagee $1 ne xaafido qofan beettis. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:DiscussionTools/Reply_tool_visual_mode_limitations Learn more]. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:DiscussionTools/Reply_tool_visual_mode_limitations Aaruwassi luxa]
discussiontools-findcomment-results-id: Ha kaalliyaagan {{PLURAL:$1|sinttaa|sinttata}}: imettida IDiyan qofaa immiyoogee beettis
discussiontools-findcomment-results-name: Ha kaalliyaagan {{PLURAL:$1|sinttaa|sinttata}}: imettida sunttan qofaa immiyoogee beettis
discussiontools-findcomment-gotocomment: I issi sinttaa ha'i zaari be'uwaa xallan beettikko, neeni [[Special:GoToComment/$1|ha gattiyaagaa go'ettiyoogan sittan qofaakko baanawu danddayaasa]]. Hankkoode i zaari hegeetu koshshaa ayfetukko kaalettees.
discussiontools-newtopic-legacy-hint: huuphe yohuwaabaa doommiyo ogee hagaana. ha ooraxissuwaa huuphe yohuwaa giddo yafaran qitsiyaa wottiyooganinne haraata qanxxo ogiyan oottana mala danddayissees. Neeni ha'ikka [$1 ashuuraa meeziyaassi zaranawu] danddayaasa.
discussiontools-newtopic-legacy-hint-ret: ha'i neeni ashuuraa meeziyaa be'aydda daasa. Neeni[$1 ooratta meeziyaakko zaaranawu] woykko doorota xomoosanawu [$2 kase meeziyaa de'iyaagaatto giigissa].
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: Hayyanaa tobbiyaassi ne huuphe yohuwaa imma. Neeni hagaa caddiyoode "{{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}" ne huuphe yohoy, huuphe yohoy baynnan gujettees.
discussiontools-notification-removed-top: {{PLURAL:$1|ha huuphe yohuwaa|ha huuphe yohota}} hagaaban neeyoo erissoy gelennan agganawu danddayees.
Huuphe yohoy "$4" issippe uttiis woykko $3 hagaappe xayiis.
{{PLURAL:$1|issi huuphe yohoy|$1 cora huuphe yohoti|100=99+ huuphe yohoti}} issippe uttidosona woykko $2 hagaappe xayidosona.
Huuphe yohoy "$4" issippe uttiis woykko xayiis.
Huuphe yohoy issippe uttiyoode woykko xayiyoode neeyyoo erissoti gelokkona.
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL:$1|Issi ooratta zaaruwaa|$1 cora ooratta zaarota|100=99+ ooratta zaarota}} giddon "$3".
discussiontools-pageframe-latestcomment: Mata wode qofaa: $1 aani $2 huuphe yohuwaa $3 giddon
discussiontools-pagetitle-newtopic: Hagaa bollan $1 ooratta huuphe yohuwaa doomiyoogaa
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-: Neeni ooratta tobbiyaa doomiyoode woykko de'iya tobbiyan qofaa immiyoode, haraati ooratta qofaa a bollan wottiyoode neeni eesuwaan eraasa.
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-: Taani hanno gaakkanawu merettibeenna tobbiyaa sinttaa xomoosiyoode:
Hagee nena ooratta huuphe yohota gujjanawu giddo yafaran qitsiyaa bessees.
discussiontools-preference-replytool-hel: Hagee nena haasayaa sinttan de'iya qofata issito caddin bessees.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon: Tumuppe ne xaafiyo qofaa agganawu koyyadii?
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic: Tumuppe ne xaafiyo huuphe yohuwaa agganawu koyyadii?
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription: Hara asi taani xaafettido huuphe yohuwan ooratta qofaa wottiyoode tana erissa.
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription-archiv: Taani xaafettido huuphe yohoy issippe uttiyoode woykko xayiyoode, woykko hara gaasuwan ooratta qofati he huuphe yohuwan wodhidaageti yedettenan attikko tana erissa.
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: Ha haruman haasaya sinttan qofay gujettis
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Go'ettiyaagee DiscussionTools kase de'iya qofaa harummis
